modName: Plate Armor Retextures lords Edition WIP
summary: Plate Armor Retex Material enhancement art work with reflection map and weapon graphic enhancement WIP
descriptionHtml:
Update 2

As i had some little time i did the retexture for the Hero Great Sword, it now look like it can really cut something, like it has just been smithed.

I post it as a test so please tell me if you like it, if so  i will upload some other weapons improvements.
__________________

Update 1

Add another retex this time darker and golden parts replaced by white polish steel, it contains several different steel stone.

Hope you\'ll enjoy it.
_____________________________

This is a retexture ( my first official) of the Nordic Plate Armor Male Version for now (female one is coming soon) .
I wanted to give that armor something special and i didn\'t liked the original material wich didn\'t felt like real metal, so it\'s been a long journey to learn about normal maps and cubemaps, all these stuffs that allow great retexture.

So i made many trys to have the correct steel tone and i redone the art works of the armors to let them matter a little more, i\'ve made some parts kind of goldish.
As the normal map didn\'t convince me enough itried to find a way to make it have some reflection effect,
After some researche and several tries i finally made my own Env_map to do the refrlection effect.
The reflection is brighter on golden parts of the armor.

anyway, to instal it that\'s the usual thing, extract to data folder in Skyrim directory (Programfiles...) merge and overwrite when asked.

Hope you like it, as it\'s my first one feel free to comment.
author: MonsterMonkey

files.name: Dark plate armor and Hero great sword smithed edition
